thought: The Apollo Program is responsible for the first moon landing!
author: John Doe

thought: The Apollo Program also responsible for further exploration of space after the successful moon landing.
author: Jane Doe

thought: According to Nasa's website, the Apollo Program also allowed for the development of human capability in a lunar environment.
author: Brian Smith

thought: The flight pattern responsible for the apollo spacecraft is called the Lunar orbit Rendezvous. It was selected in 1962.
author: Brian Smith

thought: The boosters for the Lunar Orbit Rendezvous uses booster Saturn IB for Earth flight and Saturn V for lunar by the way.
author: Jane Doe

thought: Just read the Apollo Spacecraft News Reference book that was published in 1968. Great information, if you wanna learn more.
author: Alfred Jones

thought: Did you guys know there have been 12 people to walk on the moon. Funny, I don't know if I was expecting more or less!
author: Alex Kay
